title: Gurzelen Stadion
text: Gurzelen Stadion was a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="Biel/Bienne">Biel/Bienne</a>, <a href="Switzerland">Switzerland</a>. It has mostly been used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and was the home ground of <a href="FC%20Biel-Bienne">FC Biel-Bienne</a>. The capacity of the stadium was 5,500. Gurzelen Stadion was set to be demolished in mid 2016. Gurzelen Stadion is temporarily used for the project "Terrain Gurzelen" since January 2017 until it will be demolished the earliest in 2020.
